body:
The elaborate swirls and delicate flecks of shining metal adorning the head of this pale wooden shaft make it seem almost as much a long mace as a staff. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Ray of enfeeblement (1 charge)
  • Ray of exhaustion (1 charge)
  • Scorching ray (1 charge)
  • Enervation (2 charges)
  • Disintegrate (3 charges)
name: Staff of Many Rays
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Many Rays
